response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Sum of Positive Numbers\", \"description\": \"You are given a list/array of integers. Write a function that calculates and returns the sum of all positive numbers in the input list.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef positive_sum(arr):\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns an integer representing the sum of all positive numbers in the input list. If the list is empty or contains only negative numbers, return 0.\", \"code\": \"def positive_sum(arr):\\n    return sum(x for x in arr if x > 0)\", \"tests\": [\"assert positive_sum([1,2,3,4,5]) == 15\", \"assert positive_sum([1,-2,3,4,5]) == 13\", \"assert positive_sum([]) == 0\", \"assert positive_sum([-1,-2,-3,-4,-5]) == 0\"] }"
